## Trends

## Seasonal
```{python}
from statsmodels.tsa.seasonal import seasonal_decompose
from pylab import rcParams

N,M = 16,10
result = seasonal_decompose(trends['home_equity_credit_line'], model = 'additive', period=7)
rcParams['figure.figsize'] = N,M
result.plot()
plt.show()

```
